name: Phantom
description: The Phantom embodies the essence of lost souls, drifting with a chilling presence. It has a ghostly appearance, capable of moving through solid objects, and uses its abilities to instill fear in foes.
memorable: Its ability to paralyze and frighten opponents sets it apart, alongside its vulnerability to sunlight, which hampers its effectiveness.
goals: To instill fear and harm living beings, often lingering in places of sorrow or regret.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead or haunt entities.
environment: Often found in haunted locations, graveyards, or places with strong emotional ties.
strengths: Incorporeal movement allows it to pass through obstacles; immune to many damaging effects.
weaknesses: Significantly weakened during sunlight, suffering disadvantages on rolls.
attacks: Ghostly Grasp deals necrotic damage, while Chilling Moan can frighten and paralyze targets.
most_powerful_ability: Chilling Moan, causing fear and potential paralysis to multiple targets.
additional_information: Immune to cold, necrotic, and poison damage
Resistant to various elemental damage types
Can move through objects as if in difficult terrain
Condition immunities include charmed, frightened, and paralyzed
Presence of lost souls creates an eerie atmosphere
test_queries: undead that can paralyze and frighten
lost soul drifting through the world
